name: elioored
params: class c0, class c1, class c2, wff w0

stmt.origin: syl(w0, wcel(c0, cr), wcel(c0, co(c1, cioo, c2)))

body.origin:
|- wi(w0, wcel(c0, cr))
-| wi(w0, wcel(c0, co(c1, cioo, c2)))
-| wi(wcel(c0, co(c1, cioo, c2)), wcel(c0, cr))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(w0, wcel(c0, cr))
-| wi(w0, wcel(c0, co(c1, cioo, c2)))
-| wi(wcel(c0, co(c1, cioo, c2)), wcel(c0, cr))

body.origin: |- wi(wcel(c0, co(c1, cioo, c2)), wcel(c0, cr))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(w0, wcel(c0, cr))
-| wi(w0, wcel(c0, co(c1, cioo, c2)))

comment: A member of an open interval of reals is a real. (Contributed by Glauco Siliprandi, 26-Jun-2021.)
